The last speech of Sir Godfrey McCullough of Myretoun, knight and baronet, who was beheaded at the cross of Edinburgh, the twenty sixth day of March, 1697. McCullough, Godfrey, Sir.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by John Reid, and are to be sold at his printing house in Bells Wynd, Edinburgh : 1697.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
